mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE(USER_ID, TITLE, PRICE, READ_COUNT, POSTING_DATE, PREMIUM, PHOTO, CATEGORY_ID, CONTENT, SOLDOUT) VALUES(#{userId}, #{title}, #{price}, #{readCount}, #{postingDate}, #{premium}, #{photo}, #{categoryId}, #{content}, #{soldout})
mapper.update: UPDATE ARTICLE SET TITLE=#{title}, PRICE=#{price}, PREMIUM=#{premium}, PHOTO=#{photo}, CATEGORY_ID=#{categoryId}, CONTENT=#{content}, SOLDOUT=#{soldout} WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#{articleNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ARTICLE WHERE TITLE LIKE #{search} ORDER BY ARTICLE_NO DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{numOfIndex}
